amendment.description: To advance the effective date of the eligibility verification requirements from January 1, 2028, to January 1, 2027.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2790 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2790 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2790 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2790 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
